title: Decimals Operations
description: Work with decimals like a pro! Whether it's shopping, measuring, or solving tricky problems, practice decimal operations in a game that rewards accuracy and speed!

questions.question: An item costs $6.91$. If you buy $3$ of them, what is the total cost?
An item costs $9.01$. If you buy $7$ of them, what is the total cost?
An item costs $2.67$. If you buy $6$ of them, what is the total cost?
